name: Pastel 4chan - janvier
description:
Light and soft looking 4chan theme.
Center the threads and change the colorscheme.

Thanks to variables, it should be easy to edit the colors.

If you are using 4chanX :
   -  Posts replying to you have a light green background
   -  Your posts have a light pink background
   -  Highlighted posts have a off white background
   -  The header is nice
